thread.title: European Galaxy S6 edge+ Nougat firmware now available online
thread.title_full: European Galaxy S6 edge+ Nougat firmware now available online

author: Abhijeet M.
title: European Galaxy S6 edge+ Nougat firmware now available online
text:
Abhijeet M. / 3 hours ago 
The Galaxy S6 edge+ began its transition to Android 7.0 Nougat around a week ago , and the updateâ€™s availability has now reached the European continent. Nougat firmware for the SM-G928F model is now available from our database for a a couple of countries, so those interested can download these firmware files and update their S6 edge+ to Nougat manually instead of waiting for the update to arrive over the air. 
Go here to see all Nougat firmware for the S6 edge+ in Europe. 
Firmware Details :
